title: Im always matched in an elo far higher than my own
body:
ever since I've done my placements 5/5 i was placed in silver 4 
and from there on ive been matched with mid golds and sometimes low plat as i climbed higher and higher 
but now this is just getting ridiculous 
a silver 1 (me) being matched in a low plat high gold ranks is annoying although this game the higher ranks are on my side sometimes its flipped and i may end up playing against low plat high gold while my team is low gold high silver. 
how many other people are getting this ? 
and will it be fixed  ?

replies.body: trust me you would much rather be the lowest rank in your game than the highest

The MMR that is listed on OP.gg isn't 100% accurate as the actual value isn't displayed ingame or elsewhere. The value that they show there is based off an estimate that op.gg and other sites like lolking use to try and guess the MMR of the players involved. 

Think of it this way, you win a few matches in a row against players of the same tier level and so then start getting matched with people of higher MMR, if you're climbing then a lot of the players you'll be up against will be lower MMR players of the tier above you. The reason why you're up against those players is that the matchmaking algorithm thinks that you can compete against them as your MMR is high (not even considering tiers), if you win out then you have the right to be at that MMR. If not you will lose, and go to where you're supposed to be.

(in theory)
